commit.message: Inject the `compiler_builtins` crate whenever the `core` crate is injected

verification.payload:
tree ff837586031384aec5febe548a17d1152bacd204
parent ee1014e50570e4572980e2496634cbb0eac768dd
author Oliver Schneider <git-no-reply-9879165716479413131@oli-obk.de> 1522407994 +0200
committer Oliver Schneider <git-no-reply-9879165716479413131@oli-obk.de> 1523085875 +0200

Inject the `compiler_builtins` crate whenever the `core` crate is injected

@@ -29,6 +29,8 @@ doc = false
 #
 # See https://github.com/rust-lang/rfcs/pull/1133.
 core = { path = "../../libcore" }
+compiler_builtins = { path = "../compiler_builtins_shim" }
+
 
 [features]
 # Certain parts of libc are conditionally compiled differently than when used
